Reviews.Title: Worth every penny.
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: Purchased this on a promotion from Walmart a few weeks ago. I couldn't be happier. Works flawlessly. Simple to set up and use. The promotion included a 1 GB data plan card, all for $129.00. I have various Samsung products, and this phone is no exception for quality. Coverage through Verizon is great and the phone performs great. I'm sold on Samsung products. Easy function buttons and a great resolution screen. I would highly recommend it. This is my first smartphone.

Reviews.Title: Perfect for me
Reviews.Author: AMC
Reviews.Content: This is a great little phone. I refuse to get into a contract since the prices are ridiculously overpriced. 3G really isn't all that bad and I don't really notice that much of a difference from 4G. Plus, if you have wifi at home (and most establishments), why not go the pre-paid route?

Reviews.Title: It is a good one
Reviews.Author: LizzieFS
Reviews.Content: I love this phone! I have one of my own I got this one for my bff and I am completly satisfied with product and seller!!

Reviews.Title: Great Phone!
Reviews.Author: Christine
Reviews.Content: Love this phone! Love the service and love the low monthly service cost. This phone feels solid and the interface is easy to learn and adapt to.

Reviews.Title: Good phone for starters on android
Reviews.Author: Catwoman
Reviews.Content: I had an iPhone and went to this, and it's a good phone to learn the android system.  The cameras not bad, though it's a little slow to take pictures, but otherwise it's a good, basic smartphone.

Reviews.Title: So-so
Reviews.Author: Laura N. Antar
Reviews.Content: I have had an iphone and an HTC-1, but wanted to switch to Verizon because of poor signal quality from T-Mobile, and didn't want to be locked into another plan if it had connectivity problems, too.  Well, the connectivity is fine with Verizon in my area, the price is great; but the phone, not so great.  The acoustics are poor to say the best.  The phone often freezes temporarily when you are on line, which is annoying, and it is SLOW!  The touch pad is fine, but not great.  On the other hand, my bill went from $90/mo to $45 per month, which was really a pleasure.  I wish I could use my T-mobile phone with the Verizon service.  Should be illegal to make you buy a phone and then restrict what you can do with it, but then, that's another battle!

Reviews.Title: First Smartphone
Reviews.Author: Donna Mac
Reviews.Content: Pretty good phone and I've had no problems so far. Figured a lot of things out myself. Put my mini SD card in from my other phone and transfered my pictures, also quite easy to transfer things over from computer with the micro USB cord. I refuse to get involved in a contract with any company and the Verizon prepaid plan works fine for me.So far I'm happy with this phone. The camera is a little slow, but it works okay for me. You can bluetooth contacts over from your previous phone or go to a Verizon store and take both phones and they will do it for you.

Reviews.Title: Really great!
Reviews.Author: Angela Christine Markham
Reviews.Content: Perfect condition. Works great. Awesome little phone! Verizon prepaid has limited phone options, but this one is very nice. It's similar to having a big expensive smart phone at a fraction of the cost.

Reviews.Title: love my phone
Reviews.Author: Sarah
Reviews.Content: I love this phone. Great touch screen. and awesome apps you can get with it. plus i got this cheaper then it would be buying it in a store. Got it in time as well.

Reviews.Title: Great starter smartphone
Reviews.Author: chirper9
Reviews.Content: Love this phone. This is my first smartphone and it is very responsive. I went from contract to prepaid and so far have not been dissapointed. This is one solid phone.

Reviews.Title: SAMSUNG LENEND/STELLAR
Reviews.Author: ben jacovini
Reviews.Content: wish it was easier to navigate had to go to Verizon to learn how to add pictures to cardadd cell numbers.suggest you tell of web site you can down load for this phonealso the name change from stellar to legend the difference is this phone license to Verizonhence the name change

Reviews.Title: problematic
Reviews.Author: johnnyuke
Reviews.Content: Second time I used Google navigation the widget disappeared and I couldn't get it back. Then the screen froze and had to reboot. Returned same day I purchased it as I have no confidence in tbis phone.  Salesman said that is what you get with a cheap phone.

ProductInfo.Features:
Android 4.1 (Jellybean)
3.2MP Rear-facing & 1.3MP Front-facing Cameras
4" Touch Screen
3G & Wi-Fi Capable
Virtual QWERTY Keyboard
ProductInfo.Name: Samsung Galaxy Legend
